name: urllib
description: Help in opening URLs (mostly HTTP) in a complex world — basic and digest authentication, redirections, cookies and more.

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -t 20000 -r should -r should-http test/*.test.js
